dialogues.speaker: Adventurer
dialogues.text: I've been told you have a quest for me, guild master.

dialogues.speaker: Guild Master
dialogues.text: Indeed, we have received word about a dragon terrorizing a nearby village.

dialogues.speaker: Adventurer
dialogues.text: A dragon you say? That will be a challenging feat.

dialogues.speaker: Guild Master
dialogues.text: We have faith in your abilities. Remember, the key is to use its weaknesses against it.

dialogues.speaker: Adventurer
dialogues.text: I will remember, guild master. Wish me luck.

dialogues.speaker: Guild Master
dialogues.text: Good luck, adventurer. We are counting on you.
